title: Miscellaneous
---

## Convert .MOV to .GIF

`ffmpeg -i file.mov -s 600x400 -pix_fmt rgb24 -r 20 -f gif - | gifsicle --optimize=3 --delay=3 > file.gif`

## Convert .SVG to .ICO

Uses the [imagemagick](https://imagemagick.org/index.php) utility.

`convert -background none logo.svg -define icon:auto-size favicon.ico`
